p: Baby hamster kidney (BHK)-21 cells were used for the initial virus isolation of the field isolate in Vietnam (A/VIT/15/2012), as well as for virus neutralization tests (VNT), using A 22 Iraq 64 (A22 IRQ) and A/VIT/15/2012. IBRS2 cells were used for the VNT, using A Malaysia 97 (A MAY 97). Infectious virus from samples collected during the study was isolated using secondary lamb kidney cells [ 24].
